author: By
title: Woman celebrating 113th birthday credits not having children as secret to her longevity
text:
NEEDHAM, Mass. (WHDH) – A woman in Massachusetts is celebrating her 113th birthday.
The reason she gave for making it so long may be surprising.
At 113 years old, Herlda Senhouse may be the oldest resident in Massachusetts.
The centenarian was born the same year as Lucille Ball and Ronald Reagan. The president at the time was William Howard Taft. It was also the year construction began on Fenway Park in Boston.
During her birthday celebration, Senhouse was surrounded by loved ones at Beth Israel Deaconess Hospital in Needham. She was honored with a special cane given to the oldest resident of her hometown in Wellesley.
Senhouse’s friend, Margaret Robinson, was there to help celebrate.
“She’s a lovely person and very kind, very giving, very inspirational, absolutely a wonderful person,” Robinson said.
Senhouse was born in West Virginia before she moved to Massachusetts at a young age.
“I’m so happy. It’s awesome,” she said.
A fan of the slot machines, Senhouse said she is looking forward to her next trip to the casino.
Senhouse said she credits living a more stress-free life as the reason for her longevity.
“I didn’t have children,” she said.
Copyright 2024 WHDH via CNN Newsource. All rights reserved.

title: Americans Have Invaded Kursk inside Russia
text: Guest Post by [Martin Armstrong](https://www.armstrongeconomics.com/world-news/war/americans-have-invaded-kursk-inside-russia/) [Last June, Biden lifted the ban on American contractors sending mercenaries into Ukraine. When he lifted the ban on American weapons, allowing them to be deployed inside Russia, this was another step that de facto allowed these private American military operations to invade Russia pretending it is not the official United States. I have warned that the Neocons are scared to death of Trump, and if RFK joins Trump as the Attorney General, as I have been arguing behind the curtain, they are desperate to start World War III before the election.](https://www.cnn.com/2024/06/25/politics/biden-administration-american-military-contractors-ukraine/index.html) Sources are reporting that Stephanie Holmes, the US Chargé d’Affaires in Russia, was summoned to the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs to explain why Americans have invaded Russia with the invasion of the Ukrainian Army into the Kursk region. By 2008, the US Department of Defense employed 155,826 private contractors in Iraq — and 152,275 troops. This degree of privatization is unprecedented in modern warfare. The Neocons used Biden to circumvent Congress to create World War III, deploying private armies to negate Congressional approval. Indeed, Russia has an opportunity to now annihilate the entire invading force, including Americans, by deploying a small tactical nuclear weapon inside its own borders. Nobody can say anything about that, and Russia would be within its right to do so just as if Chinese, Russian, or North Korean private military invaded the United States. September has been a significant target on our computer all year for civil unrest and international war. Gold’s performance appears linked to this action, whereas silver and platinum have not responded. While gold may peak by next week, September remains a major Panic Cycle in many markets, including gold. Russia is certainly within its right to use whatever means necessary to eradicate this invading force. If it does not respond on its own territory, then it would only invite a full-scale NATO invasion. These Neocons are traitors to the United States and the future of our nation, all for their personal hatred of Russians. It is my sincere desire to provide readers of this site with the best unbiased information available, and a forum where it can be discussed openly, as our Founders intended. But it is not easy nor inexpensive to do so, especially when those who wish to prevent us from making the truth known, attack us without mercy on all fronts on a daily basis. So each time you visit the site, I would ask that you consider the value that you receive and have received from The Burning Platform and the community of which you are a vital part. I can't do it all alone, and I need your help and support to keep it alive. Please consider contributing an amount commensurate to the value that you receive from this site and community, or even by becoming a sustaining supporter through periodic contributions. author: AOL Staff
title: Soap Star Steve Burton Finalizes Divorce From Pregnant Ex Sheree Burton
text: Soap Star Steve Burton Finalizes Divorce From Pregnant Ex Sheree Burton [Steve Burton ](https://www.usmagazine.com/celebrities/steve-burton/)and estranged wife [Sheree Burton ](https://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/pictures/sheree-burton-what-to-know-about-steve-burtons-estranged-wife/)have finalized their divorce nearly two years after their soap opera-worthy breakup announcement. According to court records viewed by Us Weekly, Steve, 53, and Sheree, 45, settled their divorce this month. Per previous documents filed, Steve and Sheree noted that the divorce is uncontested, with Sheree asking the court to terminate forever spousal support to both parties. Custody and visitation arrangements of [the pair’s three children](https://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-moms/pictures/steve-burtons-family-guide-meet-his-3-kids-with-ex-sheree-burton/), Makena, Jack and Brooklyn, have not changed. Steve announced in May 2022 that he had recently separated from Sheree after 23 years of marriage. Steve Burton and Sheree Burton: The Way They Were Steve Burton and Sheree Burton were married for 23 years before he announced their separation — and claimed his spouse was pregnant with another man’s child. Steve became famous for playing Jason Morgan on General Hospital, making his series debut in 1991. Eight years later, he married Sheree, who worked behind the scenes on the […] “I wanted to clear something up. Sheree and I are separated,” [he wrote via Instagram Story](https://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/news/steve-burton-pregnant-wife-sheree-burton-split-after-23-years/) at the time. “She recently announced that she’s expecting her 4th child. The child is not mine.” He added: “We are still co-parenting our three beautiful kids. We would appreciate privacy at this time. Much luv, Steve.” Us confirmed in July 2022 that Steve [officially filed for divorce from Sheree](https://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/news/steve-burton-files-for-divorce-from-pregnant-wife-sheree-burton/). The soap star cited “irreconcilable differences” in his petition, noting they separated the previous March. Sheree never publicly addressed their divorce nor Steve’s claims about her pregnancy. The fitness instructor gave birth to baby No. 4, daughter Izabella, in February. Celebrity Couples Who Had the Longest Divorces Getting messy! Celebrity divorces aren’t as glamorous as their Hollywood beginnings, and some last almost as long as the marriages themselves. Maria Shriver and Arnold Schwarzenegger, for example, were separated for 10 years before finalizing their divorce in December 2021. The couple split after the Kindergarten Cop actor admitted to fathering a child with their […] “Some things I’ve realized with having my 4th baby in my 40s. I know how fast it goes by,” she wrote via .” Sheree is currently 30 weeks pregnant with her fifth baby, whose father has not been publicly shared. “Current status…unexpectedly expecting my 5th baby making that 4 girls and 1 boy. ,” she wrote via She continued: “These past 2+ years have been quite an experience and I’ve learned so much about myself. I realized that I’m much stronger than I ever could have imagined and that change is a must for growth.”

author: TNN
title: Rain: Brief Waterlogging in City Areas Due to Heavy Rains | Kochi News - Times of India
text: Kochi: Heavy rains that lashed the city on Thursday noon caused waterlogging at several places. However, as the rain started to subside in the afternoon, water receded from all such points, thereby easing the difficulties caused to the public.Many parts of MG Road, including Pallimukku and Shenoy’s Junction, got inundated in the rains. “The rain subsided after almost an hour. This helped in avoiding flooding in the city. But many places in the city, especially MG Road, faced moderate waterlogging for almost an hour,” said K S Dileep Kumar, president of Ernakulam Vikasana Samithi, an NGO.Meanwhile, the city corporation’s opposition councillors said the recent rains did not worsen the waterlogging situation in the city, as the showers were brief and intermittent. “In most cases it rained during low tide. This helped to avoid a situation where the entire city got flooded,” said M G Aristotle, councillor from Kathrikkadavu. “Desilting of major canals like Thevara-Perandoor has not been completed so far. The Ombudsman for local bodies had asked the corporation to complete desilting of the mouths of Thevara-Perandoor canals by Aug. Moreover, a project started in 2018 to beautify the canals still remains incomplete,” Aristotle said. “The culverts across the city's railway lines have not been desilted either,” he said.However, corporation secretary Chelsa Sini refused to comment on the measures taken by the local body to contain waterlogging.District collector NSK Umesh said there has been some let-up in the rains since Thursday afternoon. “The water levels in Periyar, Muvattupuzhayar, and Chalakkudy rivers are receding. So, no rain-related calamities were reported from any part of the district ,” Umesh said.We also published the following articles recentlyIMD issues red alert for Delhi NCR after heavy rains, waterlogging at several placesThe India Meteorological Department issued a red alert for Delhi and NCR due to heavy rainfall, causing significant traffic congestion and flight diversions. Key areas such as Parliament and Pant Marg faced waterlogging. Authorities urged residents to stay indoors and avoid unnecessary travel. The forecast predicted more rain and potential waterlogging across the region until August 5.112173238Heavy rains in Delhi cause roadblocks, waterlogging; IMD predicts more showers, police issue traffic advisoryDelhi experienced heavy rains and thunderstorms on Friday, bringing relief from humid weather but causing waterlogging and traffic disruptions. The India Meteorological Department (IMD) predicted more rainfall in Delhi and NCR, affecting areas such as Burari and Model Town. Light to moderate rainfall with thunderstorms was reported throughout the city, leading to increased travel times and diversions.112031043Delhi rain: Drone visuals show heavy waterlogging near Saket Metro stationHeavy showers early Friday flooded roads in many parts of Delhi, causing severe waterlogging and traffic disruptions during rush hours. Commuters faced difficulties, with notable waterlogging at Saket Metro Station in south Delhi. The India Meteorological Department predicted continued cloudy skies and possible more showers later in the day.112036486

author: esportenewsmundo
title: Lesionado, Bruninho vai passar o recesso fazendo tratamento no ombro
text:
Lesionado, Bruninho vai passar o recesso fazendo tratamento no ombro
Bruninho se lesionou no último jogo do ano pelo Vôlei Renata
Bruninho se lesionou durante a partida do Vôlei Renata contra o Sesi Bauru na última terça-feira (17) e vai precisar fazer tratamento fisioterápico durante o recesso de final de ano. O capitão campineiro deslocou o ombro em meio a partida e desfalcou a equipe no restante do confronto, que foi vencido pelos comandados de Horacio Dileo por 3 sets a 2.
O levantador passou por exames de imagem e teve diagnosticado estiramento no músculo grande dorsal, localizado na região posterior do tronco, responsável por movimentar ombros e braços. O próximo compromisso do Vôlei Renata na Superliga masculina será apenas em janeiro, no dia 8, em duelo fora de casa contra o Goiás.
Nota oficial do Vôlei Renata sobre a lesão de Bruninho:
- O Vôlei Renata informa que, após exames de imagem, foi constatado um estiramento no músculo grande dorsal do levantador Bruninho. Ele iniciou tratamento fisioterápico em conjunto com a preparação física. O capitão seguirá em tratamento durante o recesso de final de ano - disse o clube através de nota oficial nas redes sociais.
Bruninho é o trunfo do Vôlei Renata nesta temporada em busca do título inédito da Superliga masculina. Com o levantador como um dos destaques do time, o Vôlei Renata encerrou o ano na vice-liderança da competição nacional, com 24 pontos ganhos, e torce contra o Minas antes do final do ano.

author: @tsnua
title: День России - в СНБО рассказали о миллионе потерь и намекнули на последствия - Мир
text:
В СНБО "поздравили" государство-агрессора с "днем России"
В четверг, 12 июня, россияне отмечают день своего "великого государства". Правда, для празднования поводов мало, ведь диктатор Путин ведет свой народ не к "светлому будущему", а к тотальному упадку.
В СНБО «поздравили» государство-агрессора с «днем России». Там указали на колоссальные потери РФ в войне против Украины.
Об этом сообщает руководитель ЦПД СНБО Андрей Коваленко.
«Миллион потерь россиян в войне с Украиной. Вот такое стремление народа России к светлому будущему. С днем», — написал он.
Ранее генерал армии Николай Маломуж объяснил, как принудить РФ и Путина к миру. Прежде Украине нужно предоставить: 10 тысяч стратегических и тактических ракет большой дальности Tomahawk; несколько тысяч тактических баллистических ракет ATACMS; тысячи самолетов, БМП M2 Bradley и танков Leopard; РЭБ, глушащие баллистические ракеты и дроны любых типов и миллионы боеприпасов.
Не менее важный элемент — экономическое давление на российскую элиту. В частности, речь идет и о семье Путина, поскольку только финансовые санкции имеют 58 закрытых позиций.
А так называемые «адские» санкции в отношении энергетики должны оказать влияние на российские нефть и газ, и, как следствие, под лидерством США Европа и Китай будут строить новый мировой порядок.

title: Tuscaloosa Fire Department gets the Texas call to assist in flooding search and rescue - NewsBreak
text:

Tuscaloosa Fire Department gets the Texas call to assist in flooding search and rescue
By Bryan Henry,
49 minutes agoTUSCALOOSA, Ala. (WBRC) - The official call came around noon Thursday, and by 3 p.m., the Tuscaloosa Fire Department Rescue and Search Team was on the road headed to Texas to assist in the flood recovery, a 900 plus mile trip straight ahead. Packed and ready to go; rescue boats,...
